availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Mial T. Mitchell (Shelby and Henry County, Kentucky, farmer and merchant.)

body.p: Shelby and Henry County, Kentucky, farmer and merchant. Virginia native. Married to M. M. Mitchell. Father of Louisa Mitchell and Martha Mitchell. Married to Elizabeth Shaw Mitchell. Father of Sarah Mitchell, Walker Mitchell, James Mitchell, Mial Mitchell, Elizabeth Mitchell, and Anna Mitchell. Farmer in Shelby County in 1850. Farmer in Henry County in 1860. Merchant in Henry County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Shelby County, District No. 1, p. 337B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, Subdivision No. 1, p. 349.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, Guestville Precinct, p. 294B.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994038, Henry County Births.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Henry County, KY, July 1863, p. 170.
